mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(post_id, writer, content, deleted, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{postId}, #{writer}, #{content}, 0, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET deleted = 1, updated_at = now() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment WHERE deleted = true AND id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, post_id, writer, content, created_at, updated_at FROM comment WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
